NoAiSection.title: 100% Human-Crafted Excellence
NoAiSection.subtitle: Zero AI, Maximum Authenticity
NoAiSection.description: We take pride in delivering work that is completely free from artificial intelligence. Every project is crafted by human experts, ensuring originality and depth that AI cannot replicate. We provide Turnitin reports to guarantee 0% AI similarity.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.intro: At Tulaab Online, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us when using our services, including your name, email address, and academic requirements.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your information to provide our services, communicate with you, and improve our platform.

protection.title: Data Protection
protection.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at info@tulaab-online.com

TermsPage.title: Terms of Service
TermsPage.intro: Welcome to Tulaab Online. By using our services, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully.

services.title: Our Services
services.content: Tulaab Online provides academic assistance services including research, writing, and project support.

usage.title: Acceptable Use
usage.content: You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with academic integrity standards.

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.content: Payment is required before service delivery. We accept various payment methods as listed on our platform.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Tulaab Online provides services 'as is' and we are not liable for any indirect or consequential damages.

CookiesPage.title: Cookie Policy
CookiesPage.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how Tulaab Online uses cookies and similar technologies.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit our website to help us provide you with a better experience.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUse.content: We use cookies to remember your preferences, analyze site traffic, and improve our services.

types.title: Types of Cookies
types.content: We use both session cookies (temporary) and persistent cookies (stored on your device) to enhance your experience.

control.title: Cookie Control
control.content: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling cookies may affect site functionality.

FaqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FaqPage.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services

q1.question: How do I place an order?
q1.answer: You can place an order by contacting us through WhatsApp, Telegram, or our contact form. Our team will guide you through the process.

q2.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q2.answer: We accept various payment methods including bank transfers, credit cards, and digital payment platforms.

q3.question: How long does it take to complete an order?
q3.answer: Delivery time depends on the complexity and scope of your project. We will provide you with a timeline when you place your order.

q4.question: Do you guarantee 0% AI content?
q4.answer: Yes! All our work is 100% human-crafted and verified by Turnitin to ensure zero AI-generated content.

q5.question: Can I request revisions?
q5.answer: Yes, we offer revisions to ensure you're completely satisfied with the final deliverable.

contactCta.title: Still have questions?
contactCta.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Contact our support team.

ContactPage.title: Contact Us
ContactPage.subtitle: Get in touch with our team. We're here to help you with your academic needs.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.name: Full Name
form.subject: Subject

AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.subtitle: Empowering students to achieve academic excellence through professional, human-crafted support.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Tulaab Online was founded with a simple mission: to bridge the gap between academic pressure and student success. We understand the challenges students face—tight deadlines, complex assignments, and the need for high-quality research. That's why we built a platform that connects students with expert tutors and writers who provide genuine, non-AI assistance.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To provide reliable, high-quality, and ethical academic assistance that helps students learn and succeed.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be the most trusted partner for students worldwide, known for our commitment to quality, integrity, and student success.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.desc: We uphold the highest standards of academic integrity.

quality.title: Quality
quality.desc: We deliver excellence in every project.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.desc: We are always there when you need us.

humanTouch.title: Human Touch
humanTouch.desc: We believe in the power of human expertise over AI.

social.title: Follow Us
social.description: Stay connected with us on social media for the latest updates and academic tips.
